bio.about: Hi, my name is Iulian and I am a senior software engineer. I am forever learner when it comes to latest advances in software and hardware technologies. I am keen on trying them in my own DIY projects.
bio.intro: Born and raised in Balti (Republic of Moldova), currently leaving in Bucharest (Romania). Holding a masters degree in Artificial Intelligence with 10+ years of experience in software engineering.
bio.name: Iulian Stan
bio.trivia: I hold a driving license for almost all kinds of vehicles.

skills: I am most experienced in the following technologies (frameworks and corresponding programming languages):
resume: I had quite an interesting journey from a bachelor of computer science to a professional software engineer. I had the opportunity to work in a multiple technological companies. My experience spans across embedded systems, communication protocols, desktop application and web interfaces.

education.title: Master's degree, Artificial Intelligence
education.summary: I pursued a master's degree to deepen my artificial intelligence knowledge in such areas as: Knowledge representation and Reasoning, Multi-agent Systems, NLP (Natural Language Processing), Statistical Learning and Neural Networks. I researched and ended my studies with a thesis on Intelligent UAV (Unmanned Aerial Vehicles).

education.title: Bachelor's degree, Information Technology
education.thesis: Remote process control in a computer network (Windows & Linux)
topics: Digital system analysis, synthesis and testing
education.summary: My bachelor studies were focused on the fundamentals of computer science, software engineering, embedded systems, graphical processing and artificial intelligence. I participated in ACM programming contest and Freescale Race Challenge. My final diploma project was Remote process control in a computer network (Windows & Linux).

work_experience.title: Software Engineer / Tech Lead
responsibilities: Redesign an existing application in compliance with new SRS
Create prototypes, design documents and software architecture
Clarify technical details of the requirements
Clarify technical details and plan the implementation

work_experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Providing web interface to ease the interaction with the server
Integrate developed components into a SaaS environment

work_experience.title: Test Automation Engineer
responsibilities: Maintaining current test suit up to date (updating existing tests according to applications changes)
Extending the suite by implementing new test as per specifications from SAT test cases
